welcomeMessage:
👋 Hey buddy! Welcome to our cozy little shop! 🍄✨

We're not just about mushrooms here, we've got legal, medicinal, and above all, soulful fungi! 🌱🌿

🛒 Wanna check out our products? Hit → /products

💳 **Payment? Easy-peasy!**
- Georgian Card ✅
- Russian Card ✅
- Cryptocurrency 🪙

🚚 **Delivery? No worries!**
- Batumi 🛵
- Surroundings? We got that too! 🚗

So feel free, pick and order! We're always glad to see you! 🤗
